attributes.action: Request UN to publicly appologise for advising the UK to scrap Monarchy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having recently read that the UN has advised the UK to scrap its Monarchy and we have been critisised for not welcoming other cultures and religions, aswell as being sexually discrimate as a nation. I propose our elected leader should formally request an appology on our behalf

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
